oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ishārāt al-marām min ʻibārāt al-Imām : manuscript, 1722
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Beyazîzade Ahmet , 1632-1687
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Light brownish laid paper with watermarks. 21.8 x 15.9 cm. (15.5 x 8 cm.).
Written in one column, 17 lines per page, in black with portions underlined in red. Comments in the margins.
According to another colophon (f. 305v), copy completed in Rajab 1134 AH [May 1722 AD].
With: Sharḥ al-Nukhbah fī uṣūl ʻilm al-ḥadīth / li-Ibn Ḥajar (ff. 1r-42v) -- ʻIqd al-marjān fī mā yataʻallaqu bi-al-jān / Nūr al-Dīn al-Ḥalabī (ff. 43r-45v).
MS Arab SM334. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Abū Ḥanīfah---767 or 768--Criticism and interpretation
Islam--Doctrines
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: اشارات المرام من عبارات الإمام : مخطوطة، 1722
